name: Hopeful Alien
description:
You are momentarily stuck in a lost village in the desert, on the way to your destination. A creature approaches you, hoping you'll help...

My entry for Mini Jam 63: Future!

A short text based story game, developed with Unity and Ink using the integration between them. I love writing story based games, and even if this time I didn't work on gameplay elements, I still found it so enjoyable to just tell a story I had in mind to the rest of the world.

Advance to the next speech bubble with Spacebar, select dialogue options with the number keys. Simple as that.

Based roughly on a recurring dream.

(One of the endings features some blood as a content warning.)

-------
